mapper.update:
update PHIP_ORG_BASE_INFO
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INT},
CATALOG_ID = #{catalogId,jdbcType=INT},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELECOM = #{telecom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EFFECTIVE_TIME_LOW = #{effectiveTimeLow,jdbcType=DATE},
EFFECTIVE_TIME_HIGH = #{effectiveTimeHigh,jdbcType=DATE},
DEPARTMENT_NAME = #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLICANT_ID = #{applicantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPRESENTATIVE = #{representative,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENSE = #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE = #{charge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE_PHONE = #{chargePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENCY_CODE = #{agencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOV_ID = #{govId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BED = #{bed,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PUBLIC_KEY = #{publicKey,jdbcType=BLOB},
WEB = #{web,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHORT_NAME = #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTICE = #{notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTE_PHONE = #{registePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUMMARY = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
G_LONGITUDE = #{glongitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
G_LATITUDE = #{glatitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMPLAINT_TEL = #{complaintTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOV_TYPE = #{govType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLECODE = #{rolecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_AT=sysdate
where id = #{id}
